metadata.title: CVE-2018-19761 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
There is an illegal address access at fromsixel.c (function: sixel_decode_raw_impl) in libsixel 1.8.2 that will cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-19761` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsixel-bin - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel-examples - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel1 - 1.8.2-2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsixel package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-2.1').
